summary: SummaryDior Capture Eye Creme is an anti-aging eye cream that visibly corrects eye wrinkles, improves firmness, and reduces signs of fatigue. The eye area looks plumper and brighter.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis Dior eye cream's light, comfortable texture is formulated with 2 exclusive hyaluronic acids for a plumping and hydrating effect. It also visibly brightens eyes instantly thanks to its 100% natural-origin pearlescent pigments.FeaturesAging, lines & wrinklesLoss of firmnessSuitable for all skin typesResearch ResultsA clinical test by a dermatologist showed that in 1 month, the eye contour is 4x smoother, 5x brighter, and 3x firmer.1 1 Clinical evaluation by a dermatologist on the evolution of the performance of the Eye Creme - 31 women. Comparison of the immediate effect vs. after 1 month.Item 2645838How To UseApply to the eye contour and massage in using circular movements.Finish the routine with Pro-Collagen Shot for an added lifting effect.IngredientsAqua (Water), Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Propanediol, Squalane, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Polyglycerin-3, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Arachidyl Alcohol, Alcohol, C10-18 Triglycerides, Maltitol, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Extract, Lilium Candidum Bulb Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Caffeine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Adenosine, Sodium Tocopheryl Phosphate, Palmaria Palmata Extract, Behenyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Sorbitol, Boron Nitride, Arachidyl Glucoside, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Xylitol, Chlorphenesin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Algin, Parfum (Fragrance), Betaine, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Polyglycerin-6, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Cellulose Gum, Lecithin, Biosaccharide Gum-2, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Citric Acid, Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Tocopherol, Inonotus Obliquus (Mushroom) Extract, Jasmine Oil/Extract, Silica, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Mica, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Polyvinyl Alcohol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to the eye contour and massage in using circular movements.Finish the routine with Pro-Collagen Shot for an added lifting effect.
